title: Emmerdale's Chas gives birth to baby girl in pub toilets after gender blunder
text:

Chas Dingle gave birth to a healthy baby girl in the pub toilets in tonight's Emmerdale.

After getting stuck inside the Woolpack's gents, it was up to Marlon Dingle to turn midwife and help deliver the bundle of joy.

Paddy Kirk very nearly missed the birth and was frantically trying to get in when Bear Wolf smashed the door down.

Manpreet told the worried parents, who tragically lost baby Grace a year ago, that their newborn was very healthy.

But there was some shock when Paddy asked what they should call "him" because of a gender blunder.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Chas and Paddy were fuming with Bear a few months back when he found the results of their scan and revealed they were having a boy.

But Chas told Paddy that me "might want to have another look" while he was holding their cherub.

"Oh," exclaimed stunned Paddy. "He's a she."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Red-faced Bear, who is learning to read, said: "Well they must have written it down wrong."

As they held their daughter, Paddy called her "beautiful" and crying Chas said: "She's perfect and she's ours."

Turning to his wife-to-be, Paddy added: "You did it because you are amazing and I love you."

(Image: ITV)

Outside of the toilet, Charity admitted she still couldn't believe the pair had a daughter.

While shaking Marlon, who helped deliver the bubba, said: "I'll have a whisky please. I’ve seen things no man should ever see."

Drunk Mandy pointed out all her baby clothes were blue, but Lydia said that wasn’t a bad thing because of gender profiling.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

It was an emotional time for Bear, who revealed that his real name is Edward, short for Teddy, therefore explaining his nickname.

He finally got a chance to hold his grandaughter in emotional scenes.

When asked about the boy/girl gaffe, he said: "if you think thats the biggest blunder bear is going to make then you’re sadly mistaken."

(Image: ITV)

Emmerdale viewers took to Twitter after watching the emotional scenes.

One fan said: "Aww very emotional Chas and paddy well done !! #Emmerdale Chas is a fantastic woman !!"

"That was just the best episode I'm so pleased for chas and paddy," added another.

A third said: "The baby's ok thank goodness! That episode with baby Grace last year was the saddest thing I had ever seen not just on a soap but on TV in general. Chas and Paddy deserve some happiness now."

"I'm so happy Chas has had a girl especially after loosing Grace," said a fourth.

*Emmerdale airs weekdays on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Chas Dingle and Paddy Kirk were convinced they were having a boy - but Bear Wolf made a massive mistake
